Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.adobe.acs.commons.functions.BiConsumer
    Use CheckedBiConsumer instead
    com.adobe.acs.commons.functions.BiFunction
    Use CheckedBiFunction instead
    com.adobe.acs.commons.functions.Consumer
    Use CheckedConsumer instead
    com.adobe.acs.commons.fam.DeferredActions
    Use the Checked function definitions and the fam.actions classes now. This class is only provided for compatibility.
    com.adobe.acs.commons.functions.Function
    Use CheckedFunction instead
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.OsgiPropertyUtil
    use ParameterUtil instead.
    com.adobe.acs.commons.mcp.util.Spreadsheet
    Class was moved to com.adobe.acs.commons.data.Spreadsheet
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.adobe.acs.commons.fam.ActionManager.addCleanupTask()
    No need to use this, cleanup is automatic.
    com.adobe.acs.commons.fam.ActionManager.deferredWithResolver(Consumer<ResourceResolver>)
    Use the method which supports CheckedConsumer instead
    com.adobe.acs.commons.workflow.synthetic.SyntheticWorkflowRunner.execute(ResourceResolver, String, List<SyntheticWorkflowStep>, boolean, boolean)
    use alternate method
    com.adobe.acs.commons.workflow.synthetic.SyntheticWorkflowRunner.execute(ResourceResolver, String, String[], Map<String, Map<String, Object>>, boolean, boolean)
    use alternate method
    com.adobe.acs.commons.workflow.synthetic.SyntheticWorkflowRunner.execute(ResourceResolver, String, SyntheticWorkflowRunner.WorkflowProcessIdType, String[], Map<String, Map<String, Object>>, boolean, boolean)
    use alternate method
    com.adobe.acs.commons.mcp.util.Spreadsheet.getDataRows()
    use getDataRowsAsCompositeVariants
    com.adobe.acs.commons.wcm.ComponentHelper.isDesignMode(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    use ModeUtil.isDesign(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.wcm.ComponentHelper.isDisabledMode(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    use ModeUtil.isDisabled(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.wcm.ComponentHelper.isEditMode(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    use ModeUtil.isEdit(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.wcm.ComponentHelper.isPreviewMode(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    use ModeUtil.isPreview(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.wcm.ComponentHelper.isReadOnlyMode(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    use ModeUtil.isReadOnly(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.wcm.ComponentHelper.isTouchAuthoringMode(ServletRequest)
    ModeUtil.isTouch(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.OsgiPropertyUtil.toMap(String[], String)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.OsgiPropertyUtil.toMap(String[], String, boolean, String)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.OsgiPropertyUtil.toMap(String[], String, boolean, String, boolean)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.OsgiPropertyUtil.toMap(String[], String, String)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.ParameterUtil.toSimpleEntry(String, String)
    Rather use ParameterUtil.toMapEntry(String, String).
    com.adobe.acs.commons.util.OsgiPropertyUtil.toSimpleEntry(String, String)
    com.adobe.acs.commons.fam.ActionManager.withQueryResults(String, String, BiConsumer<ResourceResolver, String>, BiFunction<ResourceResolver, String, Boolean>...)
    Use the method which supports CheckedBiConsumer instead
    com.adobe.acs.commons.fam.ActionManager.withResolver(Consumer<ResourceResolver>)
    Use the method which supports CheckedConsumer instead
